scripts.build: echo 'Building your project... (replace with your actual build command)'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git add package*.json && git commit -m "version $(npm --no-git-tag-version version)"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git add package*.json && git commit -m "version $(npm --no-git-tag-version version)"
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git add package*.json && git commit -m "version $(npm --no-git-tag-version version)"
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm run version:patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm run version:minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm run version:major && npm publish
